DOC.HEADLINE: MY BEST SHOT
DOC.TEXT: When Larry and Linda Gross of Encino were married in 1990 , both had already traveled thousands of miles -- he primarily in Europe and South_America , she in Europe and Asia. " That left Africa " for a 5 1 / 2-week honeymoon , Larry says . The couple arrived_at the Karnak Temples in Luxor on a July afternoon when temperatures hovered at about 120 degrees . " We didn ' t realize it would be that hot , " Gross says , but they were not distracted . " This is our memory of Africa . It seemed like time had stood still. "
